text:
Takis Loukanidis (, 25 September 1937 – 11 January 2018) was a Greek footballer of the 1950s–60s. He was born in Paranesti, Greece. Loukanidis played for the Greece national football team from 1958 through 1967.
Loukanidis died of a heart attack in Athens, Greece on 11 January 2018 at the age of 80.
